column4: hi, please i need a big help :( dono why i can't use my monitor connected to my laptop with HDMI cable, anyone can help? i have nvidia
ive seen some laptops get confused. if the cable/monitor is not plugged in when the system powers/boots up. also there may be Fn-XXX keys on the laptop to toggle the external monitor.
OR try the nvidia-settings tool to see if they detect it.
